data.name: World of Warships - Tachibana Lima Steam Edition
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

Tachibana Lima differs from destroyer Tachibana only by the unique pattern of permanent camouflage. The ship is primarily of collector's value.
Tachibana is one of the first destroyers designed and built in Japan, with good concealment, a quick-firing battery, and torpedo armament. Her artillery makes her a worthy adversary against ships of the same type, while her torpedoes are good enough to be a sufficient threat to ships of other types.

Advantages:

  • Five 76 mm guns with a reload time of 5 seconds. Despite her relatively modest caliber, this destroyer has great combat potential due her rate of fire, number of guns, and a high chance to set enemy ships on fire with just one salvo.
  • More than adequate torpedo armament: 2 twin torpedo tubes with a range of 5 km and a reload time of 22 seconds.
  • Extra credits per battle and 50% more XP provided by the permanent camouflage.

The pack also includes:

  • Port slot;
  • Steam commemorative flag

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will not receive any compensation for her.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 x86
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.7 GHz, AMD Athlon II 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800GT/9600GT, IntelHD 4000, NVIDIA GeForce 620M, AMD Radeon HD 4650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 37 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570, AMD six-core 3,5 Ghz (AMD FX 6300)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti, GeForce GTX 560M, AMD Radeon R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 37 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
